text: @BorisJohnson It is unclear whether 5bn will be enough esp when you factor in no deal, high rate of covid19 business closures, shortages due to supply chain disruptions and social unrest arising, on top of commitments to build 40 hospitals, recruit more nurses, police and doctors...
